<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="v1_1" targetNamespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/v1_0/types" xmlns:enterprise_orders_xsd="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/v1_0/types" xmlns:enterprise_common_xsd="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/common/v1_0/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ESB IDD#305 IDD#500 IDD#501.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/common/v1_0/types" schemaLocation="v1_1.xsd5.xsd"/> <!--Types--> <xsd:simpleType name="ActionNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Action Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AddressIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address ID for each Component ID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AddressLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street address line.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="100"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AttnLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Attention line on address/pkg.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BlacklistIndType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Is device blacklisted ?</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="Y|N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipmentToRetailerIndicatorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Confirmation of whether or not the serial number provided was shipped to the location provided, or not. (Y/N) are the possible values.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="Y|N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CareRepNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of Customer Care Rep.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="25"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CompIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Component ID for each action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CompanyCodeCustType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company Code of Customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CorrelationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Trackable correlation or transaction ID from processing system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustContactNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer Telephone Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="enterprise_common_xsd:CtnType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustomerSubTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer sub-type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustomerTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EmailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Email address of the customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="enterprise_common_xsd:EmailAddressType"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="60"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EquipmentTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service types of equipment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FulfillmentOrderItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Item Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="GeoCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Geo code for customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="IssueTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Issue Type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ItemDescriptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item Description from catalog.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ItemIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item ID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LineNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence number of item in the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MDNCTNType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer MDN or CTN.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="enterprise_common_xsd:MdnType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MSIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer MSId.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="enterprise_common_xsd:MinType"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MakeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Device Make.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageTextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message text.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="220"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ModelType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Device Model.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>General name field.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OMSOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Number in OMS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderActionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderReasonType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order reason.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="QuantityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Quantity, restricted to 15 digits.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,15}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="RMAKitType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Is RMA kit required.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="Y|N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="RebateType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Rebate indicator.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SAPTransIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SAP Transaction ID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SalesChannelType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sales channel.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SerialNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Serial Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ShipCondType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Shipping conditions, i.e. 1 day, 2 day, ground delivery.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TrackNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Shipment Tracking Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UICCIDType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Each SIM is internationally identified by its integrated circuit card identifier (ICCID). ICCIDs are stored in the SIM cards and are also engraved or printed on the SIM card body during a process called personalization. The ICCID is defined by the ITU-T recommendation E.118 as the Primary Account Number. Its layout is based on ISO/IEC 7812. According to E.118, the number is up to 19 digits long, including a single check digit calculated using the Luhn algorithm. However, the GSM Phase 1 defined the ICCID length as 10 octets with operator-specific structure. On GSM SIM cards there are 20-digit (19+1) and 19-digit (18+1) ICCIDs in use, depending upon the issuer. However, a single issuer always uses the same size for its ICCIDs.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> <xsd:pattern value="\d{19,20}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Structures--> <xsd:complexType name="ASNOrderLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Complex type having serialNo, USCID, Shipment Tracking Number, status and fulfillment details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serialNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:SerialNoType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Serial Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="itemStatus" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemStatusType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="trackNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:TrackNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Shipment Tracking Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderItem" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Item Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="uiccid" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:UICCIDType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>UICC Id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ATPLineAvailabilityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of items. Item Id Status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:ATPOrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="itemIdStatus" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemIdStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item ID status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ATPLineQueryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of items to query.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:ATPOrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="qty" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:QuantityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Quantity.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ATPOrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item Id and the sequenceNumber of item in request Type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lineNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:LineNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Sequence number of item in the request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="itemId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item ID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CancelOrderLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number and Order Item Number type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderItem" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderItemType"> base="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="itemStatus" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ChargeOrderLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order Action Number, component Id, Item Id and order quantity details.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:complexType name="OrderMessageType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message type indicating status, number and text details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:MessageTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message type: S Success, E Error, W Warning, I Info, A Abort.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PONROrderLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item status and fulfillment details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="itemStatus" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment name="RMAOrderLineType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment details with return date.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderLineBaseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fulfillment Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="fulfillmentOrderItem" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:FulfillmentOrderItemType"> <xsd:documentation>Return Date for RMA Charge.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--Enumerations--> <xsd:simpleType name="ForwardReturnFlagType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Forward or Return shipment.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="001"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>DF Order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="002"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RMA Return Order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ItemIdStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item ID status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="001"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Inventory Available to Order and Ship</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="002"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Inventory Temporary Not Available (Available to order, but not available to ship)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="003"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Inventory Not Available to Order - No Planned Replenishment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="004"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item_ID does not exist</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ItemStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item status:</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="P"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Point of no return</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="A"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Last ASN</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="C"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>OA Canceled</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="N"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>OA not canceled</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageTypeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message type: S Success, E Error, W Warning, I Info, A Abort.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="S"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Success</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="E"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="W"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Warning</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="I"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="A"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Abort</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderBlockType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The order block type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="B"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Block</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="U"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unblock</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LocationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The locationId of the retailer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="v1_1" targetNamespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/inventorymanagement/v1_0/messages" xmlns:enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_xsd="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/inventorymanagement/v1_0/types" xmlns:enterprise_orders_xsd="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/v1_0/types" xmlns:enterprise_common_xsd="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/common/v1_0/types" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service providing functionality for managing physical inventory.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/v1_0/types" schemaLocation="v1_1.xsd7.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/common/v1_0/types" schemaLocation="v1_1.xsd5.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://services.uscellular.com/schema/enterprise/orders/inventorymanagement/v1_0/types" schemaLocation="v1_1.xsd2.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="checkAvailability_Request" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:checkAvailability_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message element which contains requestId and atpLineQuery.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="checkAvailability_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message which contains requestId and atpLineQuery.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:CorrelationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Client request ID, for cross system tracking.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="atpLineQuery" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ATPLineQueryType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of items to query.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="checkAvailability_Response" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:checkAvailability_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Check availability response element type containing requestId, message and atpLineAvailability.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="checkAvailability_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Check availability response type containing requestId, message and atpLineAvailability.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:CorrelationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Client request ID, for cross system tracking.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderMessageType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result status message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="atpLineAvailability" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ATPLineAvailabilityType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Query result array unless an error message returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getInventoryInfo_Request" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:getInventoryInfo_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>getInventoryInfo request element type with requestId, serialNo and locationId details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="getInventoryInfo_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>getInventoryInfo request type with requestId, serialNo and locationId details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:CorrelationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Client request ID, for cross system tracking.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="serialNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:SerialNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Serial Number to check.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="locationId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:LocationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The location Id. Store location ID to validate that this device was shipped to specific retail location.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getInventoryInfo_Response" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:getInventoryInfo_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>getInventoryInfo response containing details of Blacklist indicator, equipment detail and shipment indicator.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="getInventoryInfo_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>getInventoryInfo response containing details of Blacklist indicator, equipment detail and shipment indicator.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requestId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:CorrelationIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Client request ID, for cross system tracking.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:OrderMessageType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result status message.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="blackListIndicator" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:BlacklistIndType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This field will be set to ???Y??? if the equipment is in stock (at USC/Warehose), Locked, or Blacklisted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="blackListReason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reason whay an equipment is in blackList description. Y = Blacklist ??? Lost or stolen L = Blacklist -Lock I = Blacklist - Inventory N = Not Blacklisted</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="model" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ModelType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Model.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="make" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:MakeType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Make.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="serialNo" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:SerialNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Serial Number to check.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="itemId" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item ID if known.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="itemDescription" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ItemDescriptionType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Item Description.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="shipmentToRetailerIndicator" type="enterprise_orders_xsd:ShipmentToRetailerIndicatorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Confirmation of whether or not the device represented by the serial number provided was shipped to the location provided. (Y/N) are the possible values.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="setDeviceSaleStatus_Request" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:setDeviceSaleStatus_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message element representing the setDeviceSaleStatus request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="setDeviceSaleStatus_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message type representing the setDeviceSaleStatus request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="deviceSaleStatusList" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_xsd:DeviceSaleStatusListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of device sale status updates.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="setDeviceSaleStatus_Response" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:setDeviceSaleStatus_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response message element representing the setDeviceSaleStatus success response.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="setDeviceSaleStatus_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Normal response from setDeviceSaleStatus. Contains a transaction ID for reference as no data is returned from backend; only an acknowledgement.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="responseTransactionID" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier for the response.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getEquipmentInfo_Request" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:getEquipmentInfo_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message element representing the verifyESN request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="getEquipmentInfo_RequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request message type representing the verifyESN request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="enterprise_common_xsd:EsnType" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The device ESN/MEID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="locationId" type="enterprise_common_xsd:LocationIdType" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Store location ID to validate that this device was shipped to the specific National Retailer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getEquipmentInfo_Response" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_messages:getEquipmentInfo_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The response message element for verifyESN requests.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="getEquipmentInfo_ResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Normal response from verifyESN request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="equipment" type="enterprise_orders_inventorymanagement_xsd:EquipmentType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Equipment associated with ESN being verified.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="status" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Device status code. Only KV is valid status for activation of a new ESN. If any other status is returned the activation flow must be stopped. UK-Unknown Serial Number IB-Invalid/Blacklisted IA-Invalid/Already Active SU-System Unavailable KV-Known/Valid IL-Indicates if the device was not shipped to the location IN???which means incorrect ESN pattern UC???which means, even so the ESN is valid, however the SAP item ID for this ESN was not defined in product catalog. In other words, this is device, which U.S. Cellular cannot work with OR???which means that ESN already used by other order, however Order is not completed yet, so this ESN is not in use on the network yet, however was already part of other order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="statusMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Text message explaining the status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
